bioconda.name: bioconductor-tcgabiolinks
bioconda.summary: TCGAbiolinks: An R/Bioconductor package for integrative analysis with GDC data

biotools.summary: Aims: i) facilitate the TCGA open-access data retrieval, ii) prepare the data using the appropriate pre-processing strategies, iii) provide the means to carry out different standard analyses and iv) allow the user to download a specific version of the data and thus to easily reproduce earlier research results. In more detail, the package provides multiple methods for analysis and methods for visualization to easily develop complete analysis pipelines.
